title: Screen freezes when not moving mouse if i tab out of game
body:
I don't know why, but when ever if during the loading screen or in game, if i tab out my game/screen would freeze if i stop moving the mouse until i move the mouse. it wont freeze if i'm constantly moving the mouse though. Does anyone else have any similar issues. does anyone have a solution/fix to this? I can't really play in windowed mode. also does anyone else know how i can play this on a windowed fullscreen mode?

I'm running a late 2013 Mac Book Pro retina. any help would be greatly appreciated. thanks. i'll try to record the next game and upload it so u can see what i'm talking about

replies.body: Yeah, I've never heard of this issue happening in-game. A recording would be great, since I'm not familiar with this specific issue.

Thank you for the reply. Something weird and odd happened. when i started recording, it would no longer freeze. but as soon as i would stop the recording, it would go back to freezing when not moving the mouse. this only ever happens if i tab out either during the loading screen or ingame. 1 fix i've had which is pretty annoying is closing the game and reconnecting back.

Hmm.. you mentioned above that this was similar to an issue we brought up in the service ticker in the past. Have you tested different window modes to figure out if this occurs in all modes or only specific ones?
this only occurs in either  fullscreen or borderless. never in windowed. but i can't stand to play league in windowed

Can you follow [**this guide**](https://macpaw.com/how-to/remove-startup-items-in-osx) to eliminate all the applications from your startup items temporarily? This will help us determine if this is exacerbated or caused by a background application at all.

Please let me know if this helped.
I did that, but it still hasn't helped. Still getting the issue.

Gotcha. I'd like to escalate this to our tech specialists at this time, as they'll be able to troubleshoot this further after taking a look at some of your system logs. I recommend running those logs using our [**HRT Application**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), before attaching them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our techs can get back to you.

If you run into any issues submitting your ticket, let me know.

It's like that bug that occurred about 2 weeks ago with the new update. they said for a temporary fix, to play in windowed mode. although it seems that no one else is having this issue. i am. can anyone help me? i've tried deleting and uninstalling and everything,

Hey ! i have the same problem with my Mac !! i hope there will be a fix soon ...

Macbook Pro Retina 2015 (macOS sierra)

Lol, honestly i havn't found a solution for macs yet. I installed arch linux on my mac, and run it through there. it's some what of a pain getting it up and running, but once i got it working, I no longer have an issue with the random screen freezes.

steps i've taken in mac to fix the problem:
play around with mac settings(didn't help)
completely uninstall mac, download updates and then install league still didn't help.

Install linux on mac, install league.
works excellently, except for the some time random lag spikes i've been having today, but from what i hear it's something to do with the league servers.



Wish you good luck. If you need help installing linux, just holla
